parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Removes all containers from the unit.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[removeAllContainers]] unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[removeAllContainers]] player;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[removeAllAssignedItems]], [[removeGoggles]], [[removeHeadgear]], [[removeItem]], [[removeItems]], [[removeUniform]], [[removeVest]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on 2013-7-26</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:kylania|kylania]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
This will remove the Uniform, Vest and Backpack from a unit leaving them unable to hold or pickup inventory items.
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
